features.title: Cloudflare One vs Zscaler Zero Trust Exchange: who is most feature complete? It's not who you might expect
features.description: How does Cloudflare One compare to Zscaler's Trust Exchange. Read on to find out.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Blog 1227 - CF1 vs Zscaler Image
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Blog 1227 - CF1 vs Zscaler Image

features.description: How Cloudflare's security team implemented Zero Trust controls.

imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - How our security approaches Zero Trust

imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Proxyless KubeCTL Support

features.title: Decommissioning your VDI
features.description: This blog offers Cloudflare's perspective on how remote browser isolation can help organizations offload internal web application use cases currently secured by virtual desktop infrastructure (VDI).

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Decommissioning VDI
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Decommissioning VDI

features.title: HTTP/3 inspection on Cloudflare Gateway
features.description: Today we're excited to announce the ability for administrators to apply Zero Trust inspection policies to HTTP/3 traffic.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Gateway H3 support
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Gateway H3 support

features.title: Connect to private network services with Browser Isolation
features.description: Browser Isolation with private network connectivity enables your users to securely access private web services without installing any software or agents on an endpoint device or absorbing the management and cost overhead of serving virtual desktops.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Connect to private networks with Browser Isolation
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Connect to private networks with Browser Isolation

features.title: Announcing Gateway + CASB
features.description: Find and fix shadow IT with Cloudflare's Secure Web Gateway and API-driven Cloud Access Security Broker (CASB).

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Announcing Gateway + CASB
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Announcing Gateway + CASB

features.title: A stronger bridge to Zero Trust
features.description: Today, we're announcing more enhancements to the Cloudflare One platform that make a transition from legacy architecture to the Zero Trust network of the future easier than ever.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - A stronger bridge to Zero Trust
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - A stronger bridge to Zero Trust

features.title: Using Cloudflare Tunnel and Access with Postgres
features.description: How the Database team uses Cloudflare Tunnels internally to improve security and usability of adhoc DB queries.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Postgres cluster user access
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Postgres cluster user access

features.title: Cloudflare integrates with Microsoft Intune to give CISOs secure control across devices, applications, and corporate networks
features.description: Cloudflare integrates with Microsoft Intune and combines the power of Cloudflare's expansive network and Zero Trust suite with Endpoint Manager.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Microsoft Intune Integration
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Microsoft Intune Integration

features.title: Cloudflare Gateway dedicated egress and egress policies
features.description: Cloudflare Gateway customers can now utilize dedicated egress IPs and soon will be able to control how these IPs are applied via egress policies.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Gateway traffic egress policies
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Gateway traffic egress policies

features.title: MPLS to Zero Trust in 30 days
features.description: "My home network is faster than my corporate network" is a common complaint of the employees returning to work. Legacy MPLS based networks were not built to support the shift in the applications. In this blog, find out how you can move from MPLS to Zero Trust in 30 days!

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Replacing an MPLS line step by step
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Replacing an MPLS line step by step

features.title: Announcing the Cloudflare One Partner Program
features.description: Announcing the Cloudflare One Partner Program, a program built around our Zero Trust, Network as a Service and Cloud Email Security offerings. The program helps channel partners deliver on the promise of Zero Trust while monetizing this important architecture in tangible ways.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Announcing the Cloudflare One Partner Program
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Announcing the Cloudflare One Partner Program

features.title: Press Release: Cloudflare Equips Partners to Deliver Complete Zero Trust Solution with Cloudflare One Partner Program
features.description: The Cloudflare One Partner Program presents a new way for the channel to integrate and extend Cloudflare One, the only cloud-native solution with global network scale, now with direct paths for partners from full enablement to robust incentives.

imageAssetFile.altText: Press Release Header
imageAssetFile.title: Press Release Header

features.title: CFTV: Area 1 + Cloudflare Remote Browser beta
features.description:
__Wednesday, June 22th	12:00PM PT__

Join our product and engineering teams as they discuss what products have shipped today during Cloudflare One Week!

imageAssetFile.title: CF1 Week - CFTV Area 1 + Cloudflare Remote Browser beta

features.title: CFTV: Access External Evaluation Rules
features.description:
__Wednesday, June 22nd	11:30AM	PT__

Join our product and engineering teams as they discuss what products have shipped today during Cloudflare One Week!

imageAssetFile.title: CF1 Week - CFTV Access External Evaluation Rules

features.title: CFTV: Fireside Chat with Andrew Meinert
features.description:
__Wednesday, June 22nd 10:30AM PT__

In this Cloudflare TV Cloudflare One Week segment, Cloudflare Product Manager, Kenny Johnson will host a fireside chat with Andrew Meinert, System Operations Manager at HubSpot.

imageAssetFile.title: CF1 Week - CFTV Hubspot Fireside Chat

features.title: How to augment or replace your VPN with Cloudflare
features.description: Offloading key applications from your traditional VPN to a cloud-native ZTNA service like Cloudflare Access is a great place to start with Zero Trust

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Replace your VPN
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Replace your VPN

features.title: Verify Apple devices with no installed software
features.description: Security teams that rely on Cloudflare Access can verify a user's Apple device before they access a sensitive application — no additional software required.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Private Attestation Token as device posture
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Private Attestation Token as device posture

features.title: Introducing Private Network Discovery
features.description: Rest easy knowing exactly who and what is being accessed within your private network. Introducing Private Network Discovery.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Tunnel Private Network Discovery
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Tunnel Private Network Discovery

features.title: Cloudflare recognized by Microsoft as a Security Software Innovator
features.description: Cloudflare recently won the Security Software Innovator award in recognition of our transformative technology in collaboration with Microsoft that makes work easier for our mutual customers.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Cloudflare won Security Software Innovator Award
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Cloudflare won Security Software Innovator Award

features.title: Press Release: Microsoft Names Cloudflare the Winner of its Security Software Innovator Of The Year Award
features.description: Cloudflare announces it has won the Security Software Innovator award in the Microsoft Security Excellence Awards ceremony.

imageAssetFile.altText: Press Release Header
imageAssetFile.title: Press Release Header

features.title: CFTV: Intrusion Detection
features.description:
__Tuesday, June 21st 1:00PM PT__

Join our product and engineering teams as they discuss what products have shipped today during Cloudflare One Week!

imageAssetFile.title: CFTV - 6/21 1pm - Intrusion detection

features.title: CFTV: Fireside Chat with Matt Weinberg
features.description:
__Tuesday, June 21st 8:30AM PT__

Cloudflare Director of Product Sam Rhea hosts a fireside chat with Matt Weinberg, Founder and President of Happy Cog.

imageAssetFile.title: CFTV - 6/21 8:30am - Matt Weinberg (Happy Cog)

features.title: Infinitely extensible Access policies
features.description: Starting today, we're excited that Access policies can consider anything before allowing a user access to an application. And by anything, we really do mean absolutely anything.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Access External Evaluation Rules
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Access External Evaluation Rules

features.title: How Cloudflare One solves your observability problems
features.description: Today, Cloudflare is excited to announce that we are working on Cloudflare One Visibility, a Zero Trust dashboard that will give customers complete visibility into the journey that users and devices take on a customer's enterprise network across on-ramps, filters (aka access control tools), and endpoints.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Magic Visibility
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Magic Visibility

features.title: Next generation intrusion detection: an update on Cloudflare's IDS capabilities
features.description: Cloudflare's IDS capabilities operate across all of your network traffic - any IP port or protocol — whether it flows to your IPs that we advertise on your behalf, IPs we lease to you, or soon, traffic within your private network.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Intrusion detection
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Intrusion detection

features.title: Introducing Cloudforce One: our new threat operations and research team
features.description: Meet our new threat operations and research team: Cloudforce One. While this team will publish research, that's not its reason for being. Its primary objective: track and disrupt threat actors.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Introducing New Threat Intel Team
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Introducing New Threat Intel Team

features.title: 100% year over year customer growth
features.description: Continued innovation in our Zero Trust platform to secure a company's applications, devices, and networks

imageAssetFile.altText: Press Release Header
imageAssetFile.title: Press Release Header

features.title: Introducing browser isolation for email links to stop modern phishing threats
features.description: As part of our exciting journey to integrate Area 1 into our broader Zero Trust suite, Cloudflare Gateway customers can soon enable Remote Browser Isolation for email links. With Email Link Isolation, gain an unmatched level of protection from sophisticated multi-channel email-based attacks.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Area 1 + Cloudflare Remote Browser beta
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Area 1 + Cloudflare Remote Browser beta

features.title: How to replace your email gateway with Cloudflare Area 1
features.description: Traditional SEG architectures were built for the email environments of yesteryear. Learn how to seamlessly transition to cloud-native, preemptive email security.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Replacing an email gateway with Area1
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Replacing an email gateway with Area1

features.title: Area 1 threat indicators now available in Cloudflare Zero Trust
features.description: Area 1's massive datasets of phishing campaign TTPs, seed infrastructure and threat models are now combined with Cloudflare's extensive network and global insight into the origins of DNS, email or web traffic.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Area 1 threat intelligence integration
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Area 1 threat intelligence integration

features.title: Launching In-Line Data Loss Prevention
features.description: In-line Data Loss Prevention is launching in the Cloudflare platform. Customers will be able to scan traffic to identify and protect sensitive data.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - In-Transit Data Loss Prevention
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - In-Transit Data Loss Prevention

features.title: Bring your own license and threat feeds to use with Cloudflare One
features.description: Today, we are announcing new integrations that enable our customers to integrate third-party threat intel data with the rich threat intelligence from Cloudflare One products — all within the Cloudflare dashboard. We are releasing this feature in partnership with Mandiant, Recorded Future, and VirusTotal, and will be adding new partners in the coming months.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Bring your own license and threat feeds to use with Cloudflare One (beta)
imageAssetFile.title: Cloudflare One Week 2022 - Bring your own license and threat feeds to use with Cloudflare One (beta)

Join Kenny Johnson in kicking off Cloudflare One week!

imageAssetFile.title: CFTV - CF1 Week 2022 - Welcome

features.title: CFTV: In-transit data loss prevention (DLP)
features.description:
__Monday, June 20th	1:30PM PT__

Join Noelle Gotthardt to learn more about in-transit data loss prevention (DLP).

imageAssetFile.title: In-transit data loss prevention (DLP)

features.title: Welcome to Cloudflare One Week
features.description: If you've been thinking about Zero Trust or SASE, Cloudflare One Week will demonstrate why Cloudflare One is one of the most complete SASE offerings in the market, with some of the best performance, and why it will only continue to improve.

imageAssetFile.altText: Welcome to Cloudflare One Week
imageAssetFile.title: Welcome to Cloudflare One Week

features.title: Foundational concepts: Zero Trust, SASE and SSE
features.description: Understand the Zero Trust, SASE and SSE capabilities included in the Cloudflare One platform.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cloudflare Zero Trust, SASE and SSE
imageAssetFile.title: Zero Trust, SASE and SSE Image
